00027 #ifndef __REFERENCE_BOX_H__
00028 #define __REFERENCE_BOX_H__
00029 
00030 #include "omega/osystem.h"
00031 #include "omega/scene/Renderable.h"
00032 #include "omega/scene/Effect.h"
00033 #include "omega/scene/RenderPass.h"
00034 
00035 namespace omega
00036 {
00037 namespace scene
00038 {
00039         // Forward declarations
00040         class SceneNode;
00041 
00043         class OUTILS_API ReferenceBox: public Renderable
00044         {
00045         public:
00046                 enum Side { Left, Right, Top, Bottom, Front, Back, NumSides };
00047 
00048         public:
00049                 ReferenceBox();
00050 
00051                 virtual void render(SceneNode* node, RenderState* state);
00052 
00053                 Color& getColor(Side side);
00054                 void setColor(Side side, const Color& color);
00055 
00056                 bool isFaceEnabled(Side side);
00057                 void setFaceEnabled(Side side, bool enabled);
00058 
00059                 Color& getPrimaryLineColor();
00060                 void setPrimaryLineColor(const Color& color);
00061 
00062                 float getPrimaryLineInterval();
00063                 void setPrimaryLineInterval(float value);
00064 
00065                 const Vector3f& getSize();
00066                 void setSize(const Vector3f value);
00067 
00068                 virtual const AlignedBox3* getBoundingBox();
00069                 virtual bool hasBoundingBox();
00070         private:
00071                 void drawReferencePlane(const Vector3f& min, const Vector3f& max, Axis normal, const Color& color);
00072                 void drawReferenceGrid(const Vector3f& min, const Vector3f& max, Axis normal, const Color& color, int lines);
00073 
00074         private:
00075                 bool mySideEnabled[NumSides];
00076                 Color mySideColor[NumSides];
00077                 Color myPrimaryLineColor;
00078                 float myPrimaryLineInterval;
00079                 Vector3f mySize;
00080                 AlignedBox3 myBox;
00081         };
00082 
00084         inline Color& ReferenceBox::getColor(Side side)
00085         { return mySideColor[side];     }
00086 
00088         inline void ReferenceBox::setColor(Side side, const Color& color)
00089         { mySideColor[side] = color; }
00090 
00092         inline bool ReferenceBox::isFaceEnabled(Side side)
00093         { return mySideEnabled[side]; }
00094 
00096         inline void ReferenceBox::setFaceEnabled(Side side, bool enabled)
00097         { mySideEnabled[side] = enabled; }
00098 
00100         inline Color& ReferenceBox::getPrimaryLineColor()
00101         { return myPrimaryLineColor; }
00102 
00104         inline void ReferenceBox::setPrimaryLineColor(const Color& value)
00105         { myPrimaryLineColor = value; }
00106 
00108         inline float ReferenceBox::getPrimaryLineInterval()
00109         { return myPrimaryLineInterval; }
00110 
00112         inline void ReferenceBox::setPrimaryLineInterval(float value)
00113         { myPrimaryLineInterval = value; }
00114 
00116         inline const Vector3f& ReferenceBox::getSize()
00117         { return mySize; }
00118 
00120         inline void ReferenceBox::setSize(const Vector3f value)
00121         {
00122                 mySize = value;
00123                 myBox = AlignedBox3(-mySize / 2, mySize / 2);
00124         }
00125 
00127         inline const AlignedBox3* ReferenceBox::getBoundingBox() 
00128         { return &myBox; }
00129 
00131         inline bool ReferenceBox::hasBoundingBox() 
00132         { return true; }
00133 }; // namespace scene
00134 }; // namespace omega
